Title: Wagamama High Spec
Description: ["The adorable girls of Ousui Academy's student council love to spend time with their crush, Kouki Narumi. But what happens when he isn't around? ", ' ', ' ', ' ', " For the student council, consisting of otaku president Kaoruko Rokuonji; headstrong Ashe Rufflette Sakuragi; quiet computer programmer Toa Narumi; and Toa's best friend, the impish Mihiro Miyase, it means they will have to keep themselves entertained. ", Wagamama High Spec, " offers a glimpse into the girls' lives as they get into amusing—and sometimes risqué—hijinks at their school and around town.", ' ', ' ', ' ', ' [Written by MAL Rewrite]']
Staff: [['Shimizu, Satoshi', 'Director'], ['Enomoto, Takahiro', 'Sound Director'], ['Nakamura, Koujirou', 'Series Composition'], ['Nomura, Masashi', 'Character Design']]
